fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose one of your role numbers and make a new role. That role is now occupies one of your role numbers permanently.
- Convert another player into any role between 3728 and 3764

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once a role has been made for one of your role numbers, you no longer occupy that role number slot.
- If Luka is the target of your conversion ability, the conversion bypasses all immunities.
- If this role no longer occupies any role number, it no longer exists.
- Any role that this role makes has to be themed around being an ancient lost role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make at least 1 new role and successfully convert someone to that role.
